subject: Thank you for your recent application, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$371,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://storeasupsmore.com/
